body:
Bet that sounded cooler in your head right? but eh whatever I'm not into making a habit of talking to a rando about....the values of porn? if you need to imagine yourself in these "scenarios" to get off so be it, I ain't a cop keep doing you lol. 
(I'll assume you want the last word so go ahead and take it I'm moving on to the next doujinshi of the day)
Well some people like hentai they can relate to, same way they like other stuff, not everyone is like you
also lest anyone else gets confused, don't I care that it's a thing, this is hentai nothing else, my main issue is that it goes on for the WHOLE doujinshi not just that its there
"relate to?" what the fuck does that mean?
I like the premise of the last four pages more than the rest of the comic.

What's wrong with younger looking slim guys fucking bigger futas? We already don't have enough good hentai like this we can relate to, it's always overly muscular guys or ugly bastard crap, futa x futa or futa x female, Mogiki and Musashi are one of the few rare artists that actually cater to this audience and I love that about them
biggest issue is that they're pulling an mogiki and making an effeminate boy top a full-body. full package futanari 100% of the entire doujinshi
Guys always play with the futa fuckinggggg why Musashino-Sama 😭😭😭 she fine as fuck tho 😍😍😍
whats the purpose of giving girls huge dicks but not using them? that's what I don't like about Musashi-dou's works
need her big dick in my life so bad
@jazzboy i agree its a bit of a turn off!
